data.title: Kampanya · Bring the missing Fox Kids & Jetix library on Disney+!

data.text:
SUMMARY

In 1995, Saban Entertainment and Fox Kids merged to form Fox Family Worldwide (FFW). During this merger, New World Animation was purchased thus, the Saban-Fox partnership took over Marvel's entire archive of cartoons produced between the 1966 to 1997.

In 2001, FFW was sold to Disney, so Saban's entire library, New World/Marvel shows, all ownership of Fox Kids channels and copyright/registered trademark rights of the shows, and all corporate assets passed to Disney. Then Disney launches JETIX brand which icluded brand new tv shows called as "Jetix Animation Concepts" along with remaining Fox Kids-Saban library.

WHAT WE ARE DEMANDING?

According to "US Copyright Office public records" much of the content on these channels are still Disney's property. We want Disney-owned missing library from Fox Kids, Jetix, Saban (BVS Entertainment) and New World Animation to be brought to Disney+.

1) FREEFORM (f.k.a. FOX CHILDREN PRODUCTIONS/ABC FAMILY)

Eek! The Cat

Life With Louie

The Tick (1994)(Available in the USA only)

Peter Pan and the Pirates

Piggsburg Pigs!

2) SABAN (BVS) ENTERTAINMENT & SIP ANIMATION

Diabolik: Track of the Panther

W.I.T.C.H.

A.T.O.M.

Iznogoud

Walter Melon

Mad Jack the Pirate

The Secret Files of the Spy Dogs

Nascar Racers

Xyber9: New Dawn

Bureau of Alien Detectors

Tenko and The Guardians of the Magic

Creepy Crawlers

Monster Farm

The Mouse and the Monster

The Why Why Family

Jason and the Heroes of Mount Olympos

Saban's Adventures of the Little Mermaid

Saban's Adventures of the Oliver Twist

Sweet Valley High (Live Action)

3) MARVEL PRODUCTIONS/NEW WORLD ANIMATION

Spider-Man TAS (for a potential revival)

The Marvel Super Heroes (1966)

○ Captain America

○ The Incredible Hulk

○ The Invincible Iron Man

○ The Mighty Thor

○ Prince Namor the Sub-Mariner

Spider-Man (1967)

The New Fantastic Four (1978)

The Incredible Hulk (1982)

Little Wizards (1987)

Robocop The Animated Series (1988)

Dino-Riders

Rude Dog and the DWeebs

Kid 'n Play (1990)

Attack of the Killer Tomatoes (1991)

Little Shop (1991)

Biker Mice From Mars (1993)

4) JETIX ANIMATION CONCEPTS

Get Ed

Yin Yang Yo!

Combo Niños

3RD PARTY CONTENT (NOT DISNEY)

In addition to these, a few series that are important to Fox Kids & Jetix. These series are not owned by Disney. But CineGroupe series has been co-produced with Saban.
